I am prepared to personify a workplace bully for the benefit of research and the greater good. 

Listen, those idiots wouldn't know a good idea if it hit them in the face.  They need me to steer this ship. They need me to point out their mistakes, even if it's in front of everyone else. Keeps them on their toes, you know? And frankly, it's kind of fun to watch them squirm.

I make sure they know who's boss. I "forget" to include them in important meetings. I take credit for their ideas, and when they try to speak up, I just cut them off.  It's amazing how quickly they learn to keep their heads down. 

Let's just say, I have a way of making sure everyone remembers who's in charge.  And it's not them.
